items.name: STRENGTH
items.description: Athletic ability: raw strength such as how hard you can hit or push. Used for most melee attacks.

items.name: DEXTERITY
items.description: A measure of your nimbleness, the ability to be quiet, careful or graceful. Used for AC & ranged attacks.

items.name: CONSTITUTION
items.description: Health, stamina & vital force. Determines your Hit Points, avoiding poisons, etc.

items.name: INTELLIGENCE
items.description: Book smarts, the ability to remember events, understand the arcane & think on the fly. Used to gain intel in & out of combat.

items.name: WISDOM
items.description: Your ability to understand people & animals, a representation of your intuition. Used to prevent fear or charm.

items.name: CHARISMA
items.description: Measure of your social skill, your ability to convey your message to convince others. Used for social encounters.
